content:
Today, on March 27, there is one enemy ship in the Mediterranean Mediterranean - the carpet carrier of the Caliber missiles, a total volley of up to 8 missiles.

About thisinformsNavy of the Armed Forces.

There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov Sea.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 18 vessels to the Azov Sea, 5 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 9 vessels, 2 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.
The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

As reportedArmyinform,On March 26, hostile ships were absent in the battle duty in the waters of the Black and Azov Seas.
title: Russia holds a rocket launcher in the Mediterranean Sea
description: The Navy informs about it. There are no enemy ships in the Black and Azov Sea. By...
author: Army Inform
